scratchblock:
set [color v] effect to (50)
set [color v] effect to (10) (20) (50)
name: setTint()
description: Sets the sprite's tint to the amount.

parameters.name: hue
parameters.description: A hue value in the range of 0 ... 255

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: A red value in the range of 0 ... 255

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: A green value in the range of 0 ... 255

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: A blue value in the range of 0 ... 255
